ResearchProjectDef.label: crystal orchid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the planting of ‘Crystal Orchid’, a strange plant whose fruits spontaneously take on a crystalline shape, grows slowly, and has extremely high requirements for the environment in which it grows. \n\nThe fruit of the crystal orchid has many properties that defy common sense, but has unusually harsh triggering conditions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crystal catalytic process
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synchronise Celestia's pharmaceutical technology by extracting bio-enzyme gels from organic matter. Unlock Celestia's basic medicines, such as IAS-2 immune-activating stimulants, which prevents infections and plagues, and NS-90 nervous stimulants, which provides extra efficiency but causes fatigue.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech technical interpretation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Decipher and research one of Celestia's unique technologies, Dust-Mech, a cybernetic-based programmable augmented nanomachine. Unlock the Dust-Mech emergency production method applicable to the Rimworld and unlock the actual standard Celestia technology.\n\n<color=#87cefa>"The Dust-Mech, known as the Adaptive Nano Calibration System, or ANCS, is a cybernetic-based augmented nanomachine developed by the Celestia civilisation. The Dust-Mech is capable of fusing different organisms with organisms, and organisms with machinery, and acts as a medium in which to acquire, transmit, and process information flows, and is highly adaptable when combined with intelligence. " - Parsed from Celestia's Self-explanatory Technology Core.</color>

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech reprogramming(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Dust-Mech reprogramming(WIP)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia pioneer weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Follow Celestia's standard to design pioneer weapons, allow for the creation of pioneer ice axes and the modification of simple firearms. \n\nThese antique-like designs are simply forged by forging them together with materials such as crystal capsules, yet they have the extraordinary performance of nano-precision rifling and self-airtightness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia classical weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Classical weapons designed to Celestia's weapon specifications and ammunition calibres allowed for the crafting of weapons such as the Pathfinder Sabre and improved precision rifles. \n\nThis weapon utilises electrochemical propulsion to fire ammunition and has an exaggerated energy density. Still used in Celestia Topsy-Turvy pioneer squads or issued to outpost residents for self-defence, their history is untraceable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia standard-issue weapons(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of Celestia standard firearms that emit high-energy polarised particle beams; the high-energy radiation attached to these weapons burns the target's body surface severely and interferes with the functioning of mechanics. It also allows the crafting of weapons such as Celestia standard monomolecular sabre. \n\nThese weapons had been phased out by the Celestia Navy for more than a century, but industry on the Rimworld did not support the production of naval weapons for the time being, and so these serviceable particle beam weapons became the standard for Celestia's pioneering teams as well.

ResearchProjectDef.label: experimental modified weapons(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the manufacture of magnetic reconnection accelerators and radioactive high-energy plasma emitters, weapons derived from experimental modifications of old-time ship repair tools, but capable of bursting with exaggerated lethality.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia biochemical standard
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synchronise Celestia's pharmaceutical technology by extracting bio-enzyme gels from organic matter. Unlock Celestia's basic medicines, such as IAS-2 immune-activating stimulants, which prevents infections and plagues, and NS-90 nervous stimulants, which provides extra efficiency but causes fatigue.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia combat medication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further analysis of Celestia's biochemical technology unlocks the creation of Celestia's combat drugs: CS-6 combat stimulants, which briefly stimulates tissue activity, and CS-12 combat hemostat, which accelerates wound healing. Please note that these drugs have deadly side effects at the cost of overloading cellular activity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech Call:Psychic Pharmaceuticals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of "CPS-1 Combat Psychic Stimulants", which drastically strengthens the user's psychic powers through the direct ingestion of specially encoded Dust-Mech substances.

ResearchProjectDef.label: High-risk experimental medicines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of "RS-1 Experimental Stimulants", a dangerously efficient final resort obtained by overriding the commands of Luciferium using Dust-Mech. \n\nThe overwriting and overloading of Luciferium using Dust-Mech did solve the nano-mechanical mixture's shortcomings in co-ordination ability, but it also made the drug more unstable - which then manifested itself in RS-1's high probability of coma and heart attack side effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: alternative medicine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Slightly less efficient but highly self-sufficient use of bio-enzymatic gels as a feedstock to replace neutral amines in the production of medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Invasive Implantation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks "Invasive Dust-Mech Implantation" surgery, an extreme enhancement that uses Dust-Mech substances to replace some bodily functions, most of the time with side effects that are in the controllable range for Celestia. \n\nThe Celestia's technology manual says so ...... but it doesn't say what side effects it would have on races other than Celestia.

ResearchProjectDef.label: degraded cybernetic modification
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks "Degraded Cybernetic Modification" surgery, which is generally used on creatures that have been accidentally highly assimilated by the Dust-Mech, and the formula has been tailored for Rimworld materials. \n\nThis technology is restricted to uncivilised animals by the Celestia Technology Regulatory Commission, But in fact only a simple positive or negative modification is needed to use it for humans. In the Rimworld, humans and animals don't seem to be so distinct.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech Call:Signal Transcoding(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Dust-Mech Call:Signal Transcoding(WIP)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia clothing standards
ResearchProjectDef.description: Based on complex clothing,further parsing the clothing standards which fit Celestia's body type. Unlock complex clothing for Celestia, such as trench coats, summer vests, and more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia daily wear
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of a variety of daily clothing styles common to Celestia society, such as various uniforms and stockings. These garments must be made on the Celestia tailoring tab to begin with.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pioneer military uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the military clothing of the Celestia Pioneers, a uniform style that was once the uniform of the Celestia Marines and is now widely used in the Celestia Vanguard Squad.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia professional clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Celestia's professional clothing, most of which was developed during The Navigator Programme to adapt to unknown planetary environments and was used in a variety of special scenarios.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia power assault armour(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocking the Celestia Power Assault Armour, based on the IEVA suits, combines a portion of the technology once used for the security forces of Celestia's Outer Rim domains to create a power assault armour that belongs to Celestia. \n\nThe standard power armour that was really used for Celestia's navy is difficult to make in the Rimworld, but this armour is also sufficient to face the intensity of conflict in the Rimworld.
